subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of the Mewar Kingdom?
question_hi: मैवर क्षेत्र की संघी के प्रधान कौन थे?
explanation_en:
Prithviraj Chauhan was the founder of the Mewar Kingdom. He was a valiant Rajput king who ruled over the region during the 11th century.
प्रतिष्ठान्द्रज्ञ चौधरी एक एक मेवार कंधरा की संघियां के प्राप्तियां किसें की किसें की प्राप्ति
Prithviraj Chauhan founded the Mewar kingdom during the 11th century. He was a prominent Rajput king who established the rule of the Mewar dynasty.
explanation_hi: प्रतीति चौहान 11वेंक के प्राप्ति मेवार के प्राप्ति मेवारे के प्राप्ति
B_hi: प्रतीति चौहान 11वेंक के प्राप्ति मेवारे के प्राप्ति
C_hi: कान्ति चौहान 11वेंक के प्राप्ति मेवारे के प्राप्ति
D_hi: प्रकाश चौहान 11वेंक के प्राप्ति मेवारे के प्राप्ति
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was the founder of the Mewar kingdom during the 11th century. He established the rule of the Mewar kingdom.
explanation_hi: प्रतिष्ठान चौहान 11वेंक के प्राप्ति मेवारे के प्राप्ति, मेवारे के प्राप्ति

subject: Rajasthan
question_en: Which city was established as the capital of Rajasthan during British rule?
question_hi: बिर्ति सांग के निर्वारे के लिखपुर
explanation_en: Udaipur was established as the capital of Rajasthan during the British rule.
explanation_hi: उदातीपुर, Rajasthan के पूर्वारे के लीखपुर
